goblin_warrens.name: Goblin Warrens
goblin_warrens.description: A maze of tunnels infested with goblins and their foul creations

rooms.description: A crude sleeping chamber filled with goblins
A corridor rigged with crude spike traps
A small cache of stolen goods
A locked door with goblin runes

boss_pool.name: Gutripper the Goblin Chief
boss_pool.description: The cruel leader of this goblin tribe

boss_pool.name: Warlord Snaggletooth
boss_pool.description: A massive goblin warlord who earned his position through brutal combat

boss_pool.name: The Tunnel Horror
boss_pool.description: A nightmarish creature that dwells in the deepest goblin tunnels

phases.description: Burrows underground and strikes from below

boss_pool.name: Grimtooth the Shaman
boss_pool.description: A cunning goblin shaman who wields dark magic

boss_pool.name: Gruk the Troll Enforcer
boss_pool.description: A massive troll hired to keep the goblins in line

boss_pool.name: Grimtooth the Shaman
boss_pool.description: A cunning goblin shaman who wields dark magic

boss_pool.name: Gruk the Troll Enforcer
boss_pool.description: A massive troll hired to keep the goblins in line

crypts_of_the_forgotten.name: Crypts of the Forgotten
crypts_of_the_forgotten.description: Ancient burial grounds where the restless dead walk

rooms.description: A hall filled with animated skeletons
Tomb guardians rise from their coffins
An ornate sarcophagus contains ancient relics
An altar dedicated to forgotten gods

boss_pool.name: Lord Mortis the Eternal
boss_pool.description: An ancient lich who refuses to rest

phases.description: Becomes immune until phylactery is destroyed

phylactery.description: Destroy the phylactery to remove immunity

boss_pool.name: Deathknight Valdris
boss_pool.description: A fallen paladin who now serves death itself

boss_pool.name: Elara the Banshee Queen
boss_pool.description: A tormented queen whose wail can shatter souls

boss_pool.name: Abomination Mk VII
boss_pool.description: A grotesque creation of stitched corpses and dark magic

boss_pool.name: Count Bloodmire
boss_pool.description: An immortal vampire who feeds on the living

crystal_depths.name: Crystal Depths
crystal_depths.description: A shimmering cavern filled with magical crystals and elemental guardians

rooms.description: Crystal elementals guard the passage
Crystal pillars must be activated in sequence
A geode containing rare crystals

boss_pool.name: Crystallis the Eternal Prism
boss_pool.description: A massive elemental entity of pure crystal

phases.description: Shifts to fire element, deals fire damage
Shifts to ice element, slows players

boss_pool.name: Terragor the Earth Colossus
boss_pool.description: A living mountain of stone and crystal

boss_pool.name: Infernus the Magma Wyrm
boss_pool.description: A serpentine dragon of molten rock and flame

phases.description: Dives underground and erupts with lava

boss_pool.name: Luminos the Crystal Archon
boss_pool.description: An ancient guardian of the crystal depths

boss_pool.name: Voltaxus the Storm Warden
boss_pool.description: An elemental lord of lightning and thunder

shadow_keep.name: Shadow Keep
shadow_keep.description: A fortress consumed by darkness where shadows come alive

overwhelming_darkness.description: Vision severely limited, shadow damage increased

rooms.description: Shadow assassins lurk in the darkness
A shadow knight blocks your path
A room of mirrors and shadows

boss_pool.name: Umbranox, Lord of Eternal Night
boss_pool.description: The source of all darkness, a being of pure shadow

phases.description: Shadow heralds emerge from the void

boss_pool.name: Nullifax the Void Wraith
boss_pool.description: A creature from the spaces between worlds

boss_pool.name: Tenebris the Shadow Dragon
boss_pool.description: A dragon born from pure darkness

phases.description: Takes to the air, raining shadow from above

boss_pool.name: Azaroth the Demon Overlord
boss_pool.description: A high-ranking demon general commanding legions of shadow

boss_pool.name: The Nightmare Incarnate
boss_pool.description: Fear given form, a being that feeds on terror itself

trial_of_ascension.name: Trial of Ascension
trial_of_ascension.description: An endless tower that tests the limits of your power

floor_types.description: Safe room to rest and recover

bandit_hideout.name: Bandit Hideout
bandit_hideout.description: A fortified camp where outlaws plot their next raid

rooms.description: Bandits patrol the perimeter

boss_pool.name: Blackjack the Bandit King
boss_pool.description: The ruthless leader of this outlaw band

boss_pool.name: Hawkeye the Crossbow Master
boss_pool.description: A deadly marksman who never misses

boss_pool.name: Silent Shade
boss_pool.description: A mysterious assassin employed by the bandits

boss_pool.name: Crusher the Brute
boss_pool.description: A hulking enforcer who keeps order through fear

boss_pool.name: Ember the Pyromancer
boss_pool.description: A rogue mage who burns first and asks questions never

haunted_ruins.name: Haunted Ruins
haunted_ruins.description: Ancient stone halls where restless spirits wander

haunting.description: Spirits drain your will to fight

rooms.description: Ghosts drift through the corridors

boss_pool.name: Brother Mortus the Mad
boss_pool.description: A monk driven insane by forbidden knowledge

boss_pool.name: The Headless Guardian
boss_pool.description: A decapitated knight still defending the ruins

boss_pool.name: The Wailing Widow

boss_pool.name: Keeper of Forbidden Tomes
boss_pool.description: A librarian cursed to guard dark knowledge forever

boss_pool.name: Malevolent Poltergeist
boss_pool.description: A powerful spirit that hurls objects with telekinetic force

spider_nest.name: Spider Nest

rooms.description: Giant spiders lurk in the shadows

boss_pool.name: Arachna the Broodmother
boss_pool.description: A massive spider that births countless offspring

boss_pool.name: Black Widow Queen
boss_pool.description: A sleek black spider with lethal venom

boss_pool.name: Fang the Tarantula King
boss_pool.description: A hairy behemoth with crushing mandibles

boss_pool.name: Shimmer the Crystal Spider
boss_pool.description: A beautiful but deadly spider with crystalline carapace

boss_pool.name: Silkspinner the Weaver
boss_pool.description: A spider capable of creating complex magical web patterns

sunken_temple.name: Sunken Temple
sunken_temple.description: An ancient temple submerged beneath murky waters

rooms.description: Aquatic creatures defend the temple

boss_pool.name: Thalassor the Tidal Lord
boss_pool.description: An ancient elemental that commands the seas

boss_pool.name: Spawn of the Deep
boss_pool.description: A tentacled horror from the ocean depths

boss_pool.name: Coralox the Living Reef
boss_pool.description: A massive creature made of living coral

boss_pool.name: High Priest Aquilus
boss_pool.description: The drowned priest still performing dark rituals

boss_pool.name: Young Leviathan
boss_pool.description: A juvenile sea serpent of immense size

orc_stronghold.name: Orc Stronghold
orc_stronghold.description: A fortified war camp filled with brutal orc warriors

rooms.description: Orc warriors train for battle

boss_pool.name: Warchief Grimfang
boss_pool.description: The brutal leader of the orc horde

boss_pool.name: Blademaster Korgath
boss_pool.description: A legendary orc swordsman with unmatched skill

boss_pool.name: Shaman Zugthar
boss_pool.description: An orc shaman channeling primal elemental fury

boss_pool.name: Goremaw the Siege Breaker
boss_pool.description: A massive orc that destroys fortifications

boss_pool.name: Bloodaxe the Champion
boss_pool.description: Arena champion who has never lost a duel

elemental_forge.name: Elemental Forge
elemental_forge.description: An ancient smithy where fire and earth elementals were bound

intense_heat.description: Fire damage increased, ice resistance reduced

rooms.description: Fire elementals guard the forges

boss_pool.name: Forgemaster Pyros
boss_pool.description: A fire elemental lord who shapes metal with bare hands

phases.description: Becomes white-hot, dealing extra fire damage

boss_pool.name: Stonefist the Unyielding
boss_pool.description: A living mountain that cannot be moved

boss_pool.name: Ignathor the Magma Serpent
boss_pool.description: A serpent of pure molten rock

boss_pool.name: Golem Prime
boss_pool.description: The first and most powerful golem ever forged

boss_pool.name: Infernus the Flame Djinn
boss_pool.description: A powerful fire genie bound to the forge

cursed_asylum.name: Cursed Asylum
cursed_asylum.description: An abandoned sanatorium where madness took physical form

rooms.description: Twisted patients attack from the shadows

boss_pool.name: Dr. Malice
boss_pool.description: The asylum's head physician who experimented on patients

boss_pool.name: Patient Zero
boss_pool.description: The first victim of the asylum's dark experiments

boss_pool.name: The Whisper
boss_pool.description: An aberration that feeds on sanity itself

boss_pool.name: The Bound One
boss_pool.description: A creature so dangerous it must remain restrained

phases.description: Breaks restraints and becomes more dangerous

boss_pool.name: Manifestation of Madness
boss_pool.description: The collective insanity given form

void_rift.name: Void Rift
void_rift.description: A tear in reality where void creatures pour through

rooms.description: Void creatures materialize from nothing

boss_pool.name: Herald of the Void
boss_pool.description: A messenger from the space between spaces

boss_pool.name: Entropy Incarnate
boss_pool.description: A being of pure dissolution

boss_pool.name: The Voidborn
boss_pool.description: A creature native to the void itself

boss_pool.name: Dark Matter Anomaly
boss_pool.description: A living contradiction that shouldn't exist

boss_pool.name: Nullmancer Vex
boss_pool.description: A mage who learned to harness the void

dragon_lair.name: Dragon's Lair
dragon_lair.description: A mountain cave serving as home to powerful dragonkin

rooms.description: Dragon wyrmlings defend their territory

boss_pool.name: Ignaroth the Ancient Red
boss_pool.description: An ancient red dragon with millennia of rage

phases.description: Enters a rage, breath weapon becomes more deadly

boss_pool.name: Glacius the Frost Wyrm

boss_pool.name: Tempestus the Storm Dragon

boss_pool.name: Tenebris the Shadow Drake

boss_pool.name: Morthanax the Dracolich
boss_pool.description: An undead dragon of terrible power

rooms.description: Lesser demons pour through the gate

boss_pool.name: Baal'thor the Demon Lord
boss_pool.description: A mighty demon lord leading the invasion

boss_pool.name: Infernus the Pit Fiend
boss_pool.description: A general of the demon armies

boss_pool.name: Lilithara the Succubus Queen
boss_pool.description: A seductress who drains life force

boss_pool.name: Gorathul the Balrog
boss_pool.description: A demon of shadow and flame

boss_pool.name: Mephistopheles
boss_pool.description: An archdemon of immense cunning and power

rooms.description: Mechanical guardians activate

boss_pool.description: A massive mechanical being powered by time magic

boss_pool.name: Magitek Destroyer

boss_pool.name: Ironclad Behemoth

boss_pool.name: Sentinel Protocol Alpha

plague_catacombs.description: Disease-ridden tunnels filled with the infected and undead

rooms.description: Plague zombies shamble forward

boss_pool.description: A twisted healer spreading disease instead of curing it

boss_pool.name: Plaguelord Mortis
boss_pool.description: A death knight spreading pestilence

ironman.name: Ironman Mode
ironman.description: No potions or items can be used

speed_run.description: Complete within time limit for bonus rewards

cursed.name: Cursed Run
cursed.description: All monsters have +100% stats, cursed items guaranteed
